name: The Roll Of The Dice (sadzanenyama)
description:
Your trapped. A man... and a pair of dice. Chance and probability, that is all that stands between you and death.

Audio Credits:

Fire crackling: https://freesound.org/people/JamesFarrell_97/sounds/566251/

Distant explosion sound: https://freesound.org/people/juskiddink/sounds/108640/

Slump to floor sound: https://freesound.org/people/JakLocke/sounds/261296/

Artillery Explosion: https://freesound.org/people/EFlexMusic/sounds/388528/

A short game that was initially meant to be released for the GMTK 2022 game jam. Too much to do, too little time. I decided to finish it anyway,  polished it up and created this. Very different from my other games, I'm proud of it.
